description: a(n) = (product of first n primes) modulo prime(n+1).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
mathematica: Mod[ #[ [ 1 ] ], #[ [ 2 ] ] ]&/@ Transpose[ {FoldList[ Times, 1, Prime[ Range[ 70 ] ] ], Prime[ Range[ 71 ] ]} ]
prog: (PARI) { n=-1; f=1; forprime (p=2, prime(1001), write("b062347.txt", n++, " ", f%p); f*=p ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 05 2009]
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 06 2001
